document.title: Hot Topic: Deadlines for Certification of Building and Fire Inspectors
document.abstract: All deadlines for building and fire inspector certification went into effect July 1, 1995. The state Fire Marshals' Office intends to enforce this new law.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#15
